text: - All right, we've just arrived here

(mellow music)

- [Woman] Stonefield
Villas Resort is 45 minutes
from St. Lucia's International Airport.

It's located on the
West coast of the island
near the town of Soufriere.

It has a magnificent
view of the Petit Piton.
St. Lucia's two Pitons,

the Petit and Grand Piton,
are incredible volcanic spires

that have been designated
a world heritage site.
So let's get started on our complete tour
of this luxury boutique hotel.
- Let's go see our villa.
Ta-da!

I've worked up a sweat
and I'm ready to go in.

Not bad as villas go, right?
(laughs)

Welcome to the Stonefield
Villa Resort here in St. Lucia.
And let me tell you,

if you're looking for
luxury and exclusivity,

this is one place you're
definitely gonna want to check out.
There's 17 villas here on the resort,

and all of them are
their own private oasis.

They range from one bedroom
villas with different views,
ocean view, and the Piton view,
obviously like the one behind me.
Each one has its own private pool,
which is just amazing to have.

So you can spend all your
time in your villa here.

It's great, especially
if you're on a honeymoon,
or you're looking for a romantic vacation.
This is definitely a great place to come.
Each villa itself has its own bed.

So you have a big king
size comfortable bed,
and you have an outdoor shower.
So it really is a luxurious experience,
and it's all very self-contained.
So you can have that privacy,
if that's exactly what you're looking for.
(mellow music)
Now, the resort itself is situated
on the West side of the island,
and it is in a beautiful jungle setting.
So you can wake up in the morning

and go to sleep with the
sounds of the jungle.

So you really get that
feeling of what it's like
to be completely secluded.
(mellow music)
- The sounds of the jungle.
Now this is heaven.
- [Man] It really is.

This the perfect way to
send yourself off to sleep.
- Wow.
(upbeat music)
- Now the food here is absolutely amazing.
There's one restaurant on the property,
which is The Mango Tree Restaurant,
where you will eat all of your meals,

and it's all farm to table and
locally sourced ingredients.

It's some of the best food
I've had in the island.
(upbeat music)

- Tuesday night is
cocktails by the pool night.

(mellow music)

- You don't have to actually

And if you wanna take a little

They found some petroglyphs

Right off the resort, it's

- Stonefield was built upon the grounds
of an old cocoa plantation,

and the early Carib people
are believed to have used it

as a birthing site because
of its rich fertility
and created the petroglyphs.
(mellow music)

- It's been a great hike

- St. Lucia is one of the

It's located right in the jungle,

formation of mountains here.

It's absolutely gorgeous and

The Stonefield Villas are
